text:
[Verse]
Wake up to the sunshine
Feel the light on my face
Chasing dreams in the sky
In this magical space

[Verse 2]
See the colors around
In a world so clear
Every shade in the sound
Brings the music here

[Chorus]
Daydream rainbow
Let it show
Daydream rainbow
Watch it grow

[Verse]
Walking through a meadow
Flowers in the air
Underneath a blue glow
Without a single care

[Bridge]
Close your eyes see what’s there
A land that’s bright and free
Hold on tight feel the flare
In this symphony

[Chorus]
Daydream rainbow
Let it show
Daydream rainbow
Watch it grow
title: Daydream Rainbow
